description:
Summer fireworks festival special skin!
Make giant watermelons with your friends under a night sky lit by fireworks! This summer, make Suika Game a part of your best memories!

- 14 interchangeable fruit parts
- New designs for Poppy and boxes
- Animated fireworks display background skin
- Special game start screen
- Animated fireworks effect: A spectacular effect where fireworks burst in the night sky every time fruits are merged!
- Special background music inspired by summer festivals and unique sound effects that play whenever fruits are merged
name: Fireworks display
